subject: Sailboats and Sailing
America's Cup
Maritime Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Officials and sailors from Artemis Racing had spoken little publicly, until now, of the May 9 accident in which a British sailor died, but the team is preparing to compete in the America’s Cup.
snippet: Officials and sailors from Artemis Racing had spoken little publicly, until now, of the May 9 accident in which a British sailor died, but the team is preparing to compete in the America’s Cup.
